data.title: The Early Imperial Republic: From the American Revolution to the U.S.–Mexican War 9780812297751
data.meta_description: In its first seven decades, the United States transformed from a fledgling seaboard confederation into an imperial jugge...

Chapter 10. An Empire of Illusions: Paul Cuffe, Martin Delany, and African American Benevolent Empire Building in Africa

Part III. The Ideologies of Empire

Chapter 12. Pax Americana? The Imperial Ambivalence of American Peace Reformers
